**Collapse all chunks with Alt+O / Cmd+Option+O**



## Setup

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
```

* Packages.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

* Import -- [practice safe paths](https://rstats.wtf/safe-paths.html).

```{r}
gapminder <- read_csv(here("data", "gapminder.csv"))
```

* Explore.

```{r}
glimpse(gapminder)
```

* Boxplot `lifeExp` for each continent `continent` (see `?geom_boxplot()`).

```{r boxplot-1}


```

```{r boxplot-2, eval = FALSE}
ggplot(data = _________, aes(x = _________, y = _______)) +
  geom________()
```

```{r boxplot-3, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = continent, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
